summary: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.
cast: Jackie Chan|Joey Wang|Kumiko Goto|Chingmy Yau|Gary Daniels|Tzui-Pin Wen|Leon Lai|Lap-Man Tan|Ken Lo|Eric Kot|Jan Lamb|Richard Norton|San Yip|Kei-Yan Lam|Donna Chu|Michael Wong|William Wai-Lun Duen|Kenzo Ogiwara|Vincent La Porte|Mike Abbott|Louis Roth|Sai-Tang Chan|Cordelia Choy Wai-Ling|Jim James|Bei-Dak Lai|Lynne Langdon|Mike Leeder|Hoi Mang|Michael Miller|Leila Tong|Ming-Sing Wong|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Bruce Lee|Wendee Lee|Jan Rabson|David Thomas
title: City Hunter
